TopicTitle: Display apoapsis or periapsis while using maneuver node?

Articles.Content:
I have a feeling this will be easily answered... but Is there an opotion or mod that will allow me to view my apoapsis or periapsis while using maneuver node? Will eliminate a lot of annoying guessing and mousing back and forth....

Edited May 27, 2013 by DaddyJ

I believe that, in 0.20, you can click on the markers to get the text to stay visible even after you move the mouse away. I know it works for your current orbit, but I haven't tested whether or not it does for your projected orbit after the maneuver node is placed.
I think you can now pin the apoapsis and periapsis so that it displays, I can't remember how to do it though, I am sure someone else knows.
Thanks for your help guys - Useful addition to 0.20!
I use the Engineer Redux mod for this. Strap one of the flight engineer modules to your craft and you'll have all the orbital info you need!

I think you can now pin the apoapsis and periapsis so that it displays, I can't remember how to do it though, I am sure someone else knows.
